channel.title: Need a 24/7 Hoster (Server Has WEBCLIENT and a .info website)
channel.description: Hey i wanted to see if anyone with good server hosting and server Making wanted to host my server 24/7 i host it but its not 24/7 but i want it to be i have a [color=blue]website a .info[/color] and i have [color=blue]alot of members [/color] and i have a [color=blue]WEBCLIENT[/color] and my server is [color=blue]very well coded [/color] and still getting coded plz im me if you want to be the hoster [color=blue]you will recieve owner on server [/color] of course and [color=blue]owner on website[/color].Please Post Below or you can Email me at Webmaster@blacknscape.info or you can instant Message Me at myownscape@hotmail.com
